>
[Nexian Sealing Blade](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2521)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Arcane" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=11" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Wake the Dead #1](/Sources.aspx?ID=201) pg. 26</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

More often called by their nickname “screamswords,” the Nexian sealing blades were developed by the Arclords of Nex as special tools to ward off Gebbite infiltrators and assassins. Screamswords are _+1 striking [disrupting](/Equipment.aspx?ID=294) [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=277) [longswords](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)_ with a couple of extra tricks. Each Nexian sealing blade can sense undead within 60 feet and responds by screaming loudly until there are no longer undead within that range. This same screaming can be unleashed as a sonic blast if needed.
